text.section: On petition by any person, the Secretary shall schedule and conduct public hearings and make specific findings as to the conditions described in this section.

section.section: The Administrative, Executive, and Legislative Review Committee of the General Assembly shall review at a public hearing each rule or regulation proposed for adoption under subsection (a) of this section.
The Committee promptly shall notify the General Assembly of the text of the proposed rule or regulation and of the date of the Committee's hearing on the proposed rule or regulation.
